xmp_schema.label: Example
xmp_schema.description: Example - Custom XMP File Info Panel for Adobe Creative Cloud.

xmp_property.name: ExampleProductSKU
xmp_property.label: Product SKU - Read Only:
xmp_property.description: Product SKU ( Read Only ). Useful in workflow scenarios where existing Custom Metadata may need to be viewed during image processing operations.

xmp_property.name: ExampleProductRegion
xmp_property.label: Product Region - Read Only:
xmp_property.description: Product Region ( Read Only ). Useful in workflow scenarios where existing Custom Metadata may need to be viewed during image processing operations.
